verses.verse: ה֖וֹי <WH1945> Woe עִ֣יר <WH5892> city דָּמִ֑ים <WH1818> to the bloody כֻּלָּ֗הּ <WH3605> completely כַּ֤חַשׁ <WH3585> of lies פֶּ֙רֶק֙ <WH6563> [and] robbery מְלֵאָ֔ה <WH4395> fruit לֹ֥א <WH3808> never יָמִ֖ישׁ <WH4185> departeth טָֽרֶף׃ <WH2964> the prey

ק֣וֹל <WH6963> The noise שׁ֔וֹט <WH7752> of a whip וְק֖וֹל <WH6963> and the noise רַ֣עַשׁ <WH7494> of the rattling אוֹפָ֑ן <WH212> of the wheels וְס֣וּס <WH5483> horses דֹּהֵ֔ר <WH1725> and of the pransing וּמֶרְכָּבָ֖ה <WH4818> chariots מְרַקֵּדָֽה׃ <WH7540> and of the jumping

פָּרָ֣שׁ <WH6571> The horseman מַעֲלֶ֗ה <WH5927> lifteth up וְלַ֤הַב <WH3851> both the bright חֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> sword וּבְרַ֣ק <WH1300> and the glittering חֲנִ֔ית <WH2595> spear וְרֹ֥ב <WH7230> and [there is] a multitude חָלָ֖ל <WH2491> of slain וְכֹ֣בֶד <WH3514> and a great פָּ֑גֶר <WH6297> number of carcases וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> none קֵ֙צֶה֙ <WH7097> and [there is] none end לַגְּוִיָּ֔ה <WH1472> of [their] corpses [יִכְשְׁלוּ כ] (וְכָשְׁל֖וּ <WH3782> bereave ק) בִּגְוִיָּתָֽם׃ <WH1472> upon their corpses

מֵרֹב֙ <WH7230> Because of the multitude זְנוּנֵ֣י <WH2181> harlot זוֹנָ֔ה <WH2181> of the harlot ט֥וֹבַת <WH2896> one חֵ֖ן <WH2580> favour בַּעֲלַ֣ת <WH1172> the mistress כְּשָׁפִ֑ים <WH3785> of witchcrafts הַמֹּכֶ֤רֶת <WH4376> that selleth גּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> nations בִּזְנוּנֶ֔יהָ <WH2183> of the whoredoms וּמִשְׁפָּח֖וֹת <WH4940> and families בִּכְשָׁפֶֽיהָ׃ <WH3785> through her witchcrafts

הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold אֵלַ֗יִךְ <WH413> I am against נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> Behold I [am] against thee saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וְגִלֵּיתִ֥י <WH1540> and I will discover שׁוּלַ֖יִךְ <WH7757> thy skirts עַל־ <WH5921> over פָּנָ֑יִךְ <WH6440> upon thy face וְהַרְאֵיתִ֤י <WH7200> and I will shew גוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> the nations מַעְרֵ֔ךְ <WH4626> thy nakedness וּמַמְלָכ֖וֹת <WH4467> and the kingdoms קְלוֹנֵֽךְ׃ <WH7036> thy shame

וְהִשְׁלַכְתִּ֥י <WH7993> And I will cast עָלַ֛יִךְ <WH5921> and שִׁקֻּצִ֖ים <WH8251> abominable filth וְנִבַּלְתִּ֑יךְ <WH5034> upon thee and make thee vile וְשַׂמְתִּ֖יךְ <WH7760> and will set כְּרֹֽאִי׃ <WH7210> thee as a gazingstock

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> will come כָל־ <WH3605> all רֹאַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH7200> And it shall come to pass [that] all they that look יִדּ֣וֹד <WH5074> upon thee shall flee מִמֵּ֔ךְ <WH4480> at וְאָמַר֙ <WH559> from thee and say שָׁדְּדָ֣ה <WH7703> is laid waste נִֽינְוֵ֔ה <WH5210> Nineveh מִ֖י <WH4310> Who יָנ֣וּד <WH5110> who will bemoan לָ֑הּ מֵאַ֛יִן <WH370> her? whence אֲבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> shall I seek מְנַחֲמִ֖ים <WH5162> comforters לָֽךְ׃

הֲתֵֽיטְבִי֙ <WH3190> Art thou better מִנֹּ֣א <WH4996> No אָמ֔וֹן <WH528> multitude הַיֹּֽשְׁבָה֙ <WH3427> that was situate בַּיְאֹרִ֔ים <WH2975> among the rivers מַ֖יִם <WH4325> [that had] the waters סָבִ֣יב <WH5439> round about לָ֑הּ אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> her Whose חֵ֣יל <WH2426> it whose rampart יָ֔ם <WH3220> [was] the sea מִיָּ֖ם <WH3220> the sea חוֹמָתָֽהּ׃ <WH2346> [and] her wall

כּ֥וּשׁ <WH3568> Ethiopia עָצְמָ֛ה <WH6109> [were] her strength וּמִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> and Egypt וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> without קֵ֑צֶה <WH7097> limits פּ֣וּט <WH6316> Put וְלוּבִ֔ים <WH3864> and Lubim הָי֖וּ <WH1961> were among בְּעֶזְרָתֵֽךְ׃ <WH5833> were thy helpers

גַּם־ <WH1571> Yet הִ֗יא <WH1931> he לַגֹּלָה֙ <WH1473> Yet [was] she carried away הָלְכָ֣ה <WH1980> she went בַשֶּׁ֔בִי <WH7628> into captivity גַּ֧ם <WH1571> Also עֹלָלֶ֛יהָ <WH5768> her young children יְרֻטְּשׁ֖וּ <WH7376> also were dashed in pieces בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> at the top כָּל־ <WH3605> of every חוּצ֑וֹת <WH2351> of all the streets וְעַל־ <WH5921> for נִכְבַּדֶּ֙יהָ֙ <WH3513> for her honourable men יַדּ֣וּ <WH3032> and they cast גוֹרָ֔ל <WH1486> lots וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all גְּדוֹלֶ֖יהָ <WH1419> and all her great men רֻתְּק֥וּ <WH7576> were bound בַזִּקִּֽים׃ <WH2131> in chains

גַּם־ <WH1571> too אַ֣תְּ <WH859> you תִּשְׁכְּרִ֔י <WH7937> Thou also shalt be drunken תְּהִ֖י <WH1961> become נַֽעֲלָמָ֑ה <WH5956> thou shalt be hid גַּם־ <WH1571> too אַ֛תְּ <WH859> you תְּבַקְשִׁ֥י <WH1245> thou also shalt seek מָע֖וֹז <WH4581> strength מֵאוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> because of the enemy

כָּ֨ל־ <WH3605> All מִבְצָרַ֔יִךְ <WH4013> All thy strong holds תְּאֵנִ֖ים <WH8384> [shall be like] fig trees עִם־ <WH5973> with בִּכּוּרִ֑ים <WH1061> with the firstripe figs אִם־ <WH518> lo יִנּ֕וֹעוּ <WH5128> if they be shaken וְנָפְל֖וּ <WH5307> they shall even fall עַל־ <WH5921> and פִּ֥י <WH6310> into the mouth אוֹכֵֽל׃ <WH398> of the eater

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold עַמֵּ֤ךְ <WH5971> Behold thy people נָשִׁים֙ <WH802> of thee [are] women בְּקִרְבֵּ֔ךְ <WH7130> in the midst לְאֹ֣יְבַ֔יִךְ <WH341> unto thine enemies פָּת֥וֹחַ <WH6605> shall be set wide נִפְתְּח֖וּ <WH6605> open שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <WH8179> the gates אַרְצֵ֑ךְ <WH776> of thy land אָכְלָ֥ה <WH398> shall devour אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> the fire בְּרִיחָֽיִך׃ <WH1280> thy bars

מֵ֤י <WH4325> thee waters מָצוֹר֙ <WH4692> for the siege שַֽׁאֲבִי־ <WH7579> Draw לָ֔ךְ חַזְּקִ֖י <WH2388> fortify מִבְצָרָ֑יִךְ <WH4013> thy strong holds בֹּ֧אִי <WH935> go בַטִּ֛יט <WH2916> into clay וְרִמְסִ֥י <WH7429> and tread בַחֹ֖מֶר <WH2563> the morter הַחֲזִ֥יקִי <WH2388> make strong מַלְבֵּֽן׃ <WH4404> the brickkiln

שָׁ֚ם <WH8033> There תֹּאכְלֵ֣ךְ <WH398> devour אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> There shall the fire תַּכְרִיתֵ֣ךְ <WH3772> shall cut thee off חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> thee the sword תֹּאכְלֵ֖ךְ <WH398> it shall eat thee up כַּיָּ֑לֶק <WH3218> like the cankerworm הִתְכַּבֵּ֣ד <WH3513> make thyself many כַּיֶּ֔לֶק <WH3218> as the cankerworm הִֽתְכַּבְּדִ֖י <WH3513> make thyself many כָּאַרְבֶּֽה׃ <WH697> as the locusts

הִרְבֵּית֙ <WH7235> Thou hast multiplied רֹֽכְלַ֔יִךְ <WH7402> thy merchants מִכּוֹכְבֵ֖י <WH3556> above the stars הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heaven יֶ֥לֶק <WH3218> the cankerworm פָּשַׁ֖ט <WH6584> spoileth וַיָּעֹֽף׃ <WH5774> and flieth away

מִנְּזָרַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH4502> Thy crowned כָּֽאַרְבֶּ֔ה <WH697> [are] as the locusts וְטַפְסְרַ֖יִךְ <WH2951> and thy captains כְּג֣וֹב <WH1462> as the great grasshoppers גֹּבָ֑י <WH1462> of grasshoppers הַֽחוֹנִ֤ים <WH2583> which camp בַּגְּדֵרוֹת֙ <WH1448> in the hedges בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> day קָרָ֔ה <WH7135> in the cold שֶׁ֤מֶשׁ <WH8121> [but] when the sun זָֽרְחָה֙ <WH2224> ariseth וְנוֹדַ֔ד <WH5074> they flee away וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נוֹדַ֥ע <WH3045> is not known מְקוֹמ֖וֹ <WH4725> and their place אַיָּֽם׃ <WH335> where

נָמ֤וּ <WH5123> slumber רֹעֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH7462> Thy shepherds מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> O king אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria יִשְׁכְּנ֖וּ <WH7931> shall dwell אַדִּירֶ֑יךָ <WH117> thy nobles נָפֹ֧שׁוּ <WH6335> is scattered עַמְּךָ֛ <WH5971> [in the dust] thy people עַל־ <WH5921> on הֶהָרִ֖ים <WH2022> upon the mountains וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there מְקַבֵּֽץ׃ <WH6908> and no man gathereth

אֵין־ <WH369> There כֵּהָ֣ה <WH3545> [There is] no healing לְשִׁבְרֶ֔ךָ <WH7667> of thy bruise נַחְלָ֖ה <WH2470> is grievous מַכָּתֶ֑ךָ <WH4347> thy wound כֹּ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> All שֹׁמְעֵ֣י <WH8085> all that hear שִׁמְעֲךָ֗ <WH8088> the bruit תָּ֤קְעוּ <WH8628> of thee shall clap כַף֙ <WH3709> the hands עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> over כִּ֗י <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> over מִ֛י <WH4310> whom לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not עָבְרָ֥ה <WH5674> passed רָעָתְךָ֖ <WH7451> over thee for upon whom hath not thy wickedness תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> alway
